title: FiveG
author: FiveG
content: This market is not favourable since 2021 till now like as of last two years that was a boom let's face the fact about, bitcoin price has drastically reduced the number of buyers overtime, even most of you that have it before aren't buying more bitcoin recently because of the waving price dilemma. Think of it this way, if you sleep by 8pm and wake up by 5am to discover that bitcoin rise up to $50k, will is you said is scam? Or will you regret for not buying again? Believe me it will shock many people how the bull will react. Keep buying if trust bitcoin

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: This is the kind of post you should be writing and spreading everywhere other than this forum in my opinion; we are (I mean, on this exact forum) already absolutely convinced that Bitcoin is not a scam and many of us already have our own strategies in place, whether it be through spot buying, DCA, mining etc..Let's also not forget that a small part of the community doesn't care about the BTC/FIAT value, and will simply tell you 1 BTC = 1 BTC, no matter when or no matter how the market is doing.Quote from: FiveG on May 21, 2023, 06:51:55 PM even most of you that have it before aren't buying more bitcoin recently because of the waving price dilemma. No "price dilemma" when you are DCAing

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on May 21, 2023, 06:51:55 PMThis market is not favourable since 2021 till now like as of last two years that was a boom let's face the fact about, bitcoin price has drastically reduced the number of buyers overtime, even most of you that have it before aren't buying more bitcoin recently because of the waving price dilemma. Think of it this way, if you sleep by 8pm and wake up by 5am to discover that bitcoin rise up to $50k, will is you said is scam? Or will you regret for not buying again? Believe me it will shock many people how the bull will react. Keep buying if trust bitcoin On 2021, it's actually a good year and one of the best bull runs that I've ever seen. But then, after the bull run it has to lie low and have to go through a bear market which was the one that you've said wasn't favourable at all.Enough with saying or thinking that bitcoin is a scam if its price moves up. We're done with that and only those people that have no bitcoin are keep on saying that. But most likely when we see the price of bitcoin moves up, we're regretting that we haven't bought when it's cheap. Those that have been holding, there's no problem if that part was missed.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on May 21, 2023, 06:51:55 PMThink of it this way, if you sleep by 8pm and wake up by 5am to discover that bitcoin rise up to $50k, will is you said is scam? Or will you regret for not buying again? Believe me it will shock many people how the bull will react. Keep buying if trust bitcoin Price isn't what decides if a certain cryptocurrency/asset is legit or not. There have been thousands and thousands of cryptocurrency scams that rose a lot in price solely because of hype — those price increases don't necessarily make them not-a-scam.

comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on May 21, 2023, 06:51:55 PMThis market is not favourable since 2021 till now Prior to 2021, the previous all time high was just shy of $20,000. Between then and now bitcoin has reached new ATHs, peaking at $68,000. This is a favorable market.Quote from: FiveG on May 21, 2023, 06:51:55 PMbitcoin price has drastically reduced the number of buyers overtime, even most of you that have it before aren't buying more bitcoin recently because of the waving price dilemma.I would rather buy at under $30,000 than to buy at $70,000. True bitcoiners are still buying and double down when the price goes down.Quote from: FiveG on May 21, 2023, 06:51:55 PMThink of it this way, if you sleep by 8pm and wake up by 5am to discover that bitcoin rise up to $50k, will is you said is scam?A 100% increase overnight is shocking and not likely to happen, but that does not make bitcoin a scam.- Jay -

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on May 21, 2023, 06:51:55 PMThis market is not favourable since 2021 till now like as of last two years that was a boom let's face the fact about, ~ How can you say that? From the lows of late last year and early this year, Bitcoin looks quite favorable to me now. It is like saying the roller coaster is no fun because you are currently on the uphill climb. Just wait for that exhilarating downhill rush, my friend! The cryptocurrency market is full of surprises, and who knows what exciting twists and turns await us in the future. So, buckle up and enjoy the ride!

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on May 21, 2023, 06:51:55 PMThis market is not favourable since 2021 till now like as of last two years that was a boom let's face the fact about, bitcoin price has drastically reduced the number of buyers overtime, even most of you that have it before aren't buying more bitcoin recently because of the waving price dilemma. Think of it this way, if you sleep by 8pm and wake up by 5am to discover that bitcoin rise up to $50k, will is you said is scam? Or will you regret for not buying again? Believe me it will shock many people how the bull will react. Keep buying if trust bitcoin For those of us who missed out on the early Bitcoin investment, we believe that now is the moment to invest in Bitcoin because the price is relatively cheap and Bitcoin has a bright future ahead of it.Some investors who previously had Bitcoin are still holding it patiently out of confidence, believing that this bear market is a passing fad that will soon pass and Bitcoin will be back on track to recoup its value.

comments.author: Issa56
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on May 21, 2023, 06:51:55 PMThis market is not favourable since 2021 till now like as of last two years that was a boom let's face the fact about, bitcoin price has drastically reduced the number of buyers overtime, even most of you that have it before aren't buying more bitcoin recently because of the waving price dilemma. How sure are you that bitcoin price has drastically reduced the number of bitcoin buyers, I think you should back your post up with proof, and how sure are you that most of us are not buying bitcoin anymore, let me be honest with you, the only time I will stop buying bitcoin is when I don't have any extra cash with me, but if am having money that I know I won't be using for now, then I can never stop buying bitcoin no matter how low bitcoin price is, because I believe bitcoin will be grate once again, it might just take time and am ready to wait. Am sure the only people that will stop buying bitcoin are the once that are new to crypto space. Quote from: FiveG on May 21, 2023, 06:51:55 PMThink of it this way, if you sleep by 8pm and wake up by 5am to discover that bitcoin rise up to $50k, will is you said is scam? Or will you regret for not buying again? Believe me it will shock many people how the bull will react. Keep buying if trust bitcoin Why will I say bitcoin is a scam if bitcoin rise to $50k, it's normal to me and I will never regret why bitcoin rise, am not really satisfied with the amount of bitcoin am holding, but at least am holding bitcoin. The only people that will regret why they didn't buy are the once that think Bitcoin is a scam and the once that keep on saying bitcoin will dump more and they are waiting for it to dump before they buy.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: It's wrong to speculate figures or things when you don't have concrete fact on it and make it or try to make it appears as the truth, many investors in crypto-currency do like times like this because it mean that can buy in on Bitcoin now that the price is down. I doubt if there is any experience member who would fear holding Bitcoin now going by the type of history Bitcoin has already created. By the way the halving of Bitcoin is coming up next year and many people has been anticipating for this and would be buying more Bitcoin now hoping the bull run would happen around the Bitcoin halving period.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: In my opinion about that, I had said that after the last ATH of Bitcoin in 2021, it become bearish, giving people who are ready to buy more time to accumulate and wait while it prepares for another bull run that might give up another ATH. Although it may not likely give another ATH, but since Bitcoin is a store of value, any time the price drops, it's really time to buy because, as time passes, the value will increase, leading to a price increase too.From the example you gave, no one needs to really regret anything if the price hits $50,000 any time soon. The reason being that they all had the chance to buy when the price was down, but they did not, so what they need to do is hold on for when the price drops, and they should buy if they truly wish to invest in Bitcoin.

comments.author: cryptomaniac_xxx
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on May 21, 2023, 06:51:55 PMThis market is not favourable since 2021 till now like as of last two years that was a boom let's face the fact about, bitcoin price has drastically reduced the number of buyers overtime, even most of you that have it before aren't buying more bitcoin recently because of the waving price dilemma. Think of it this way, if you sleep by 8pm and wake up by 5am to discover that bitcoin rise up to $50k, will is you said is scam? Or will you regret for not buying again? Believe me it will shock many people how the bull will react. Keep buying if trust bitcoin Of course the market is not favorable because we are in a bear market. I don't know where you get your numbers that bitcoin buyer numbers has reduced? care to share your research? If not then you can see the data on bitcoin addresses here:https://www.lookintobitcoin.com/charts/addresses-holding-x-btc-by-year/So it is growing despite the bear market. The best way to do is DCA and accumulate as many as you can before the eventual bull run next year.

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: It's always good to hodl bitcoin, aside that we need to be careful regarding profits, it's never a waste of money especially for the bitcoin community members who understands how bitcoin works. Halving is coming up soon, hodl or buying more is some of the best strategies for a now bearish cryptocurrency market. The bullish run could be massive or average, but it'll arrive and everyone will get rewarded according to the number of sats they have in their wallet.

comments.author: Ojima-ojo
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on May 21, 2023, 06:51:55 PMThis market is not favourable since 2021 till now like as of last two years that was a boom let's face the fact about, The thing is that we can never have a stable bitcoin price and bitcoin can not continue in one direction trend and we must take advantage of the various market discounts as to buy the dip and wait for when the price will reflect that price benchmark you mention. But on a contrary opinion, I do t think bitcoin have underperformed in the year 2023 since the price increased significantly. Quotebitcoin price has drastically reduced the number of buyers over time, even most of you that have it before aren't buying more Bitcoin recently because of the waving price dilemma. Think of it this way, if you sleep by 8 pm and wake up by 5 am to discover that bitcoin rises up to $50k, will is you said is a scam? Or will you regret for not buying again? Believe me it will shock many people how the bull will react. Keep buying if trust bitcoin We have to used to such movement I the BTC market as there have been a lot Of ups and down in the market but. That's the nature of Bitcoin and that is why BTC is referred to as a volatile asset. But with all of that, if we can properly manage our DCA level at each point we will have a very good chance to make the best out of every market position.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on May 21, 2023, 06:51:55 PMThis market is not favourable since 2021 till now like as of last two years that was a boom let's face the fact about, bitcoin price has drastically reduced the number of buyers overtime, Market not being favorable all depends on how you perceive the market. There are people who will boldly say the market has been in their favor since the 2021 last bull run. This is because they have studied the market, and both in bullish and bearish markets they always find a way to take profit, but that doesn't mean that they don't lose trades most times as well.Quoteeven most of you that have it before aren't buying more bitcoin recently because of the waving price dilemma.I've had it before, and I also sold it out before, and I'm fine with the selling price. Right now, I've put the past ATH aside, and my accumulation now is based on what I expect to see in the future and not just an assumption of what could happen.Quote Think of it this way, if you sleep by 8pm and wake up by 5am to discover that bitcoin rise up to $50k, will is you said is scam? Or will you regret for not buying again? Believe me it will shock many people how the bull will react. I can never say it's a scam. This is because the nature of Bitcoin allows it to have a rapid move, and most times the price can't actually be predicted, so any form of price movement is allowed. I will only regret it if I don't have at least a few SATs to sell and celebrate the pump, and I won't be too angry if I am not fast enough to bag more; that could be very greedy of me.Quote Keep buying if trust bitcoin Yes, that's the goal: to keep on accumulating till I reach my holding target, which I believe I will achieve no matter the price difference.

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on May 21, 2023, 06:51:55 PM Think of it this way, if you sleep by 8pm and wake up by 5am to discover that bitcoin rise up to $50k, will is you said is scam? Or will you regret for not buying again? Believe me it will shock many people how the bull will react. Keep buying if trust bitcoin When people say it's too high to buy, I tend to ask what's the ATH. The price I recall keeps it at $69k. Now that's high when you try to compare with where we have the price now which is around $26.7k. Hence, there is little reason for one not to be actively buying bitcoin. We already hit rock bottom for the bearish market and ain't going to dip that much no more.One reason why one might not want to buy aside from the fact that, your cared of another bearish fall or the fact that they aren't so sure of bitcoin is that, you've got no funds, spare funds.For that, there have been a solution on how to go about investing and not have much issues. The idea is to DCA! Using dollar cost averaging to follow up your investing. It's one way to go about buying even at a high price.

comments.author: Ndabagi01
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on May 21, 2023, 06:51:55 PMThink of it this way, if you sleep by 8pm and wake up by 5am to discover that bitcoin rise up to $50k, will is you said is scam? Or will you regret for not buying again? Believe me it will shock many people how the bull will react. Keep buying if trust bitcoin Seeing such a boom in bitcoin prices will only surprise me slightly because I did not expect a 100% price growth.  I won't consider bitcoin a scam because I already believe in it and intend to invest in it. If the price increase comes as a surprise, DCA should alleviate the problem of not being able to buy while the price was very low.

comments.author: LogitechMouse
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on May 21, 2023, 06:51:55 PMThis market is not favourable since 2021 till now like as of last two years that was a boom let's face the fact about, bitcoin price has drastically reduced the number of buyers overtime, even most of you that have it before aren't buying more bitcoin recently because of the waving price dilemma. It depends TBH.Not favorable? Probably yes if you bought Bitcoin at it's peak. What if you're one of the many investors who are waiting for this time to happen? It will be more favorable for you because you will have the opportunity to buy Bitcoin at a discounted price. Always take note that there's always opportunity in the crypto markets, and it all depends on you as an investor if you will grab it. Drastically reduced the number of buyers overtime? Probably because most of the buyers are the ones who don't have the courage to buy Bitcoin when it's going down because they are afraid to lose their money.Quote from: FiveG on May 21, 2023, 06:51:55 PMThink of it this way, if you sleep by 8pm and wake up by 5am to discover that bitcoin rise up to $50k, will is you said is scam? Or will you regret for not buying again? Believe me it will shock many people how the bull will react. Keep buying if trust bitcoin I will wake up immediately because I know that your scenario will just be a dream, and in reality, it will never happen. Kidding aside, I will not say that it will be a scam even though that thing will happen, but in reality it will not happen, or at least in an overnight. It might happen in a few weeks especially when the market is in a bull run. As for the bull run, I've seen the crypto market went into the bull run twice already (2017 & 2021). Did I felt shocked? Not at all. I didn't feel any happiness whatsoever during the last bull run, because I don't have plans on selling at that time. Turns out that it's my worst decision ever because I just let my potential profits slip. Instead of happiness, I felt disappointed on myself, but at the same time, it was a lesson learn. Like the OP said, keep buying Bitcoin as long as you are trusting it. Bitcoin is more than a year away, and a few months after that, the bull run will happen (base on it's past cycles).

comments.author: Churchillvv
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on May 21, 2023, 06:51:55 PMThis market is not favourable since 2021 till now like as of last two years that was a boom let's face the fact about, bitcoin price has drastically reduced the number of buyers overtime, Bitcoin has not been favourable to some while some are busy making profits from the slightest opportunity. To begin with, I have noticed people tend to rush into Bitcoin when the price is very high and reduce when the price is low defiling the law of demand and supply that states that higher the price the lower the quantity demanded while the lower the price higher the quantity demanded. People who are more knowledged about Bitcoin buy BTC when the price is low as to make profit when the price rises, this kind of investment is also seen in the long time investors.Quote even most of you that have it before aren't buying more bitcoin recently because of the waving price dilemma.  I don't think Bitcoin is in any dilemma, it all depends on individuals view what you think isn't what am thinking. Bitcoin is just in it's present, if you know the past of Bitcoin and compare it with the present it will give a you clearer vision of the future of Bitcoin and it's price.QuoteThink of it this way, if you sleep by 8pm and wake up by 5am to discover that bitcoin rise up to $50k, will you say it is a scam? Or will you regret for not buying again? Believe me it will shock many people how the bull will react. Keep buying if trust bitcoin  Bitcoin can't be a scam no matter the price it hits, actually some of us here in this forum even pray it gets to such level/ price and I don't think I will have a regret since I don't regret not having a Bitcoin when it was 1$ I will not still regret it now. With the little know I have about Bitcoin I will keep trusting in it.

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on May 21, 2023, 06:51:55 PMThis market is not favourable since 2021 till now like as of last two years that was a boom let's face the fact about, bitcoin price has drastically reduced the number of buyers overtime, even most of you that have it before aren't buying more bitcoin recently because of the waving price dilemma.A bear market is bad for newbies but it is good for veteran traders and investors. They wait for bear market to take advantage and get richer months later when a bull market comes.Halving will come in 2024, stay tuned and tie your seat belt.https://bitcoinblockhalf.com/QuoteThink of it this way, if you sleep by 8pm and wake up by 5am to discover that bitcoin rise up to $50k, will is you said is scam?Rising to $50k from what price? From $48k  Bitcoin can have its good rise but it won't be x5, x10, x20 or x100 after 24 hours like shitcoins. With its biggest marketcap in cryptocurrency market, it is impossible for Bitcoin to have such magic rises like altcoins or scam coins with smaller marketcap and smaller trading volume.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on May 21, 2023, 06:51:55 PMThis market is not favourable since 2021 till now like as of last two years that was a boom let's face the fact about, bitcoin price has drastically reduced the number of buyers overtime, even most of you that have it before aren't buying more bitcoin recently because of the waving price dilemma. Think of it this way, if you sleep by 8pm and wake up by 5am to discover that bitcoin rise up to $50k, will is you said is scam? Or will you regret for not buying again? Believe me it will shock many people how the bull will react. Keep buying if trust bitcoin You will not generalize that the market has not been favorable. This is because some people have made huge profits from the Bitcoin market. People that bought last year when the price was low might have made 100% profit. I don't also believe that the price drop has drastically reduced the number of buyers because, for those who understand the market, this is the best time to buy. I have always believed that due to the uniqueness of Bitcoin, it will always increase in value. So I will not be surprised if it gets to any price because it has such potential.QuoteAre you still buying?Yeah, I am still buying and I will not stop. Even in the bull run, I will keep buying because the next run might always be better than the former. I hope you are also buying so that you wouldn't join those that will regret it.
